file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

paths:
  /users/{first}/{second}:
    get:
      summary: Get a user by ID
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: first
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
        - in: path
          name: second
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses: 
        '200':
          description: Положительный ответ с данными.
          content:
            application/json: 
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/LoyaltyCard"

  /user/loyalty/card:
    get: 
      summary: |
        Test endpoint
      parameters:
        - name: city_id
          in: query
          description: id города, ПВЗ которого необходимо вернуть
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: hell
          in: query
          description: id города, ПВЗ которого необходимо вернуть
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses: 
        '200':
          description: Положительный ответ с данными.
          content:
            application/json: 
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/LoyaltyCard"
        '500':
          description: |
            Возможные ошибки
            * `108` - NoLoyaltyCard - У пользователя отсутствует карта лояльности
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "../common/models.yaml#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"
    delete: 
      responses: 
        '204':
          description: Success
    post: 
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/LoyaltyCardRequest"
      parameters:
        - name: city_id
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses: 
        '204':
          description: Success
    patch: 
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/LoyaltyCardRequest"
      responses: 
        '201':
          description: Success

  /onboarding:
    get:
      security: []
      parameters:
        - name: cityId
          in: query
          description: Идентификатор города
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: type
          in: query
          description: Тип онбординга
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/OnboardingType"
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
               $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/Onboardings"
               
  /coordinates:
    get:
      security: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Координаты успешно получены
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/CoordsArrayResponse"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /coordinates: get: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "models.yaml#/components/schemas/CoordsArrayResponse": external "models.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
